name: I Can Fight Robots
description:
CAN YOU SURVIVE AGAINST 100 ROBOTS?

I Can Fight Robots has:

  • A quick single screen scrap match against 100 foes.
  • Gameplay styled after a beloved Capcom franchise

Keyboard Controls:
Z Key - Use screen bomb (you must have one in reserve)
X Key - Jump
C Key - Shoot
Enter Key - Pause
F4 - Toggle fullscreen

The I in the title isn't me. I made this small game for a coworker a couple years back. Please enjoy and rate and comment!

All gameplay design, music and game assets were created by me.
